TitleEnglish: Hello Carbot the Movie: The Secret of Omphalos Island
SummaryEnglish: Chatan and his family go on vacation to a warm island in the South Pacific called Omparos, but they end up stranded. Omparos is a mysterious island known as the 'belly-button of Earth'. Chatan and his family are in danger of being attacked by the alien robots that want the Super Tool Box, but he and his family risk everything to save the world!
Aliases: Hello Carbot Theater Version: The Secret of Island Omparos
